main event: A man in Blanchester, Ohio reported seeing a bright, lit-up craft that came straight towards his vehicle before zooming straight up and disappearing in 1968.
interesting points: The object appeared to be focused on the ground and the observer could briefly follow the edge of the light.
The object made a sudden start and stop, but did not change color, brightness, shape, or make any noise.
The object hit the observer's eyes with a bright light, which is what drew his attention to it.
The object moved away very fast and just faded away.
The observer did not see the object through any optical aids like glasses or a window.
